question:
Last year, Pluto became a trending topic in the news as a space craft named Dawn visited this freezing cold body of Solar System. Since 2006, Pluto has been defined as dwarf planet.

BECAUSE

This rocky planet has more than one satellite differs from other terrestrial planets such as Earth.

choices.label: Pernyataan pertama dan kedua benar serta memiliki hubungan sebab-akibat.
Pernyataan pertama dan kedua benar, tetapi tidak memiliki hubungan sebab-akibat.
Pernyataan pertama benar, sedangkan pernyataan kedua salah.
Pernyataan pertama salah, sedangkan pernyataan kedua benar.
